column2: Total Elector count using the Principal Electoral Roll of 2024 combined with Supplementary Electoral Rolls of January 2025, of which the January 2025 Supplementary Roll that was gazetted on 21st February 2025
57.0% Malay, 21.0% Chinese, 14.2% Indian, 0.1% Bumiputera Sabah, 0.1% Bumiputera Sarawak, 6.6% Orang Asli, 1.0% Others
31315 Ordinary Voters, 582 Police Voters and Spouses
